lines.text: It makes sense, doesn't it? To kill us, he must be metal.
Your brother and I will be waiting for you, at Cyborg City.
BOY! How does it, that one of ours is killed, and you are here, alive, and on his horse?
Lucky - as a pig in shit!
[whips Boy around the neck and throws him against a cliff, thus killing him]
[as Nea charges at him with a spear]
Where do you plan to stick that thing?
mystical, powerful, invincible. And we humans became victims of their hunger.
Oh no! Am I on fire now? Yeah... great.
I want to join the army you're gathering. I'm not one of these farmers, I'm just travelling with them until I found you.
Then help me gather up these pumpkin-heads without killing them.
